field.label: Description
field.help: Add an optional description for this Prefix-List.

field.label: Name
field.help: Name of the Prefix-List, descriptive of its purpose. If there should be multiple entries for the same prefix list, give them all the same name.

field.label: IP Version
field.help: Set the IP version to use.

field.label: Action
field.help: Set permit for match or deny to negate the rule.

field.label: Network
field.help: Specifies a network pattern to match, with optional ge (greater than or equal) and le (less than or equal) attributes to control the prefix length range. For example, a pattern like "192.168.0.0/16 ge 24 le 28" matches any route within the 192.168.0.0/16 block with prefix lengths from /24 to /28.
